<<<<<<< HEAD
The old wiues tale A pleasant conceited comedie, played by the Queenes Maiesties players. Written by G.P. Peele, George, 1556-1596.
[48] p.
By Iohn Danter, and are to be sold by Raph Hancocke, and Iohn Hardie, Printed at London : 1595.
G.P. = George Peele. Signatures: A-F⁴. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank. Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
The old wiues tale A pleasant conceited comedie, played by the Queenes Maiesties players. Written by G.P. Peele, George, 1556-1596.
[48] p.
By Iohn Danter, and are to be sold by Raph Hancocke, and Iohn Hardie, Printed at London : 1595.
G.P. = George Peele. Signatures: A-F⁴. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank. Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Iohn Hardie
Raph Hancocke
Iohn Danter
